name: Amazing wonders of Manila!
description: The special thing about visiting Manila is that you will see a place in which old meets new. A splash of Spanish and American touch of the buildings and structures plus the various churches that symbolizes the Christian faith of the Filipinos can be seen. Also, you will able to see that even though earthquakes, fires, typhoons and even World War II destroyed the beauty of Manila, it would always rise again to inspire and to give hope. So come on and let us visit Manila.
